Subject: Configure NEA to look for Sensitive Data Discovery
Description:
We're currently licensed for "Sensitive Data" in NEA.

As a start, we'd like to ensure NEA is configured to look for appropriate data types for sensitive data discovery that aligns with industry best practices wrt data security.

Please advise.
Solution_Comment__c:
Symptom/Issue: Needed details on how to Configure NEA to look for Sensitive Data Discovery

Causation: SEEK job was not set up.

Resolution:

Noted that the scan should be pointed to the same File System Objects that the Permissions (FSAA) job is scanning, unless it is scoped differently.

Referred to the Configuration guide: Netwrix Enterprise Auditor v11.6 > Administration > Global Settings > Sensitive Data
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Admin/Settings/SensitiveData/Overview.htm

Contacts response:

Stated that the guide addressed the issue and that we could close the case.
